title: marosibrothers has become a bit better, isn`t it?
content:
here`s the new logo i have made, based more or less on your suggestions. curious thought about new ones.

P.S. the motto is about to appear...who knows when? :P

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021075054im_/http:/typophile.com/files/new%20logo%202_5191.jpg)
author: marosi_lorant

comments.content:
"marosibrothers has become a bit better, isn`t it?"

I do hope so. But it also depends on how bad they were earlier :)

Is there a previous thread you can point to?
